name: Withdrawn
description:
Withdrawn is an interactive fiction where you're following the main character's routine, thoughts, memories and his constant fear of living.

You're able to influence his closure with your choices, so be aware. The simplest things in life have huge impact in our way of seeing the world and how to deal with it.




• Hand-drawn (Rotoscoping technique)
• Point-and-click gameplay
• Multiple endings
• Immersive soundtrack
• Steam achievements
